Head of Machine Learning ⚡Series C HealthTech 🚀United States (Remote)$250K+ base salary (in addition to Equity + Benefits)A Series C funded Healthtech is looking to hire a Vice President of Machine Learning. This company is on a mission to make people’s sleep count. Through the use of innovative technology, detailed design, and proven science and data they are taking sleep personalisation to new heights, helping people improve their sleep each night, resultantly, bettering peoples health and performance.ResponsibilitiesLead a team in the development of next gen ML models, algorithms, and insightsArchitect infrastructures that enable rapid prototyping and deployment of models and insightsCross collaborating with R&D, product and software teams to incorporate design into productionAdvance the field of ML algorithms for sleep health, and publish your work at top conferences and journalsRequirementsMSc/PhD in Computer Science or Engineering8+ years of industry experience in the field of health sensing and health technologiesExperience building out ML infrastructureExpert proficiency with ML and deep learning frameworksExpert level Python, PyTorch and TensorflowExperience working with Signal Processing and Time-Series DataWhy applyOpportunity to join a fast growing Healthtech start up early on in their growth journeyVery competitive salaryFlexible PTO401kMedical, Dental and Vision InsuranceGreat people to work with – a team that supports D&I🌎 US (Remote)📧 Interested in applying? Please click on the ‘Easy Apply’ button or alternatively email me your resume at jamal.aminu@storm3.com⚡ Storm3 is a HealthTech recruitment firm with clients across major Tech hubs in Europe, APAC and North America. To discuss open opportunities or career options, please visit our website at storm3.com and follow the Storm3 LinkedIn page for the latest jobs and intel
